TopicTitle: wondering how to put my photos into a thread????

Articles.Content: Hi all. Been playing for awhile but new to here. And was wondering how to add photos to a thread??

Upload your screenshots to a picture hosting website such as Imgur.com, and copy the links they provide into your posts. 

And welcome to the forum.

Welcome to the forums!

As @Vanamonde said, use a site like imgur. Make sure you get the direct link, or it will not be imbedded. With imgur you just press link then hit direct link. Copy and paste link where you would like the image in your post.

I have probably been doing it the hard way, but I use Flickr and here is what I do. (note: I changed the 'p' in https to a 'd' to purposely break it so you can see the text.) 

Here is what the embedded code looks like from Flicker. I copy and paste this to notepad or and other text editor.

<a data-flickr-embed="true"  href="https://www.flickr.com/photos/105254422@N04/32938412346/in/dateposted-public/" title="karin2"><img src="httds://c1.staticflickr.com/1/455/32938412346_d800c57d27_o.jpg" width="667" height="448" alt="karin2"></a><script async src="//embedr.flickr.com/assets/client-code.js" charset="utf-8"></script>
 

The part you want to put in the 'insert other media' field is in bold. It is the url in quotation marks after img src=
